ygData.subject: Reasearch
ygData.msgSnippet: Help please! Can anyone tell me how to correctly research? Every time I try it I get the message the quantities and componenets are not in the correct amount
ygData.messageBody:
Help please!

Can anyone tell me how to correctly research?
Every time I try it I get the message "the quantities
and componenets are not in the correct amount to
produce anything" or something to that affect.
Is this the standard fail message or am i doing
something wrong? I'm a magician and have the elmental
grimore which has 4 slots, should i put something
in all four slots or do we just use 2(one word and
one component). Can anyone answer that for me?

Does anyone have a good site to go to that explains
reasearch? I sure cant find one.

Thanks
